title: Twin Flames
description: They’ve been Twin Flame soul mates for five centuries. But in this life he's married to someone else. Until the great timeline reset changes everything…York, Present dayCara tumbles off a stepladder in a bookshop and opens her eyes to see a handsome, dark-eyed stranger standing over her. It’s love at first sight and an intense feeling of déjà vu.A Tarot reading reveals Cara and George are Twin Flame soul mates, destined to be together through multiple lives in an ancient spiritual contract.London, 1536The chance meeting triggers Cara to time slip to Henry VIII and Anne Boleyn’s Tudor Court, where she is happily married to Earl George Cavendish. Falsely accused of treason and witchcraft, they go on the run with a price on their noble heads.Cara finds herself in a race against time to save George before the timeline resets and they lose each other forever…Publisher’s note: This book is angsty & contains ow drama that is happily resolved. It can be read as a standalone. It is also book 1 in the Twin Flames series featuring the same couple.
author: Rachel Henke
